title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no listing of child nodes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. Make sure the new data source does not have any database/table/column information.
3. Attempt to change the data source for the data set.

Expected behavior:
When changing the data source, the data set editor page should display the listing of child nodes.

Additionally, close the data set editor and reopen it to see if the issue persists.
